title: Between Husband & Wife: Gospel Perspectives on Marital Intimacy
description: Hundreds of thousands have relied on Between Husband and Wife as a gospel-based resource on marital intimacy. In this expanded and revised edition, authors Stephen Lamb and Douglas Brinley combine gospel perspectives with the newest research on the differences between men and women and medical breakthroughs for treating all kinds of intimacy-based issues. With updated and expanded information for couples of all ages, this revised edition is a valued resource throughout the entire marriage.
author: Stephen E. Lamb
